tweakeroo.config.generic.name.breakingRe: 破坏模式限制方式调节
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.accurat:
使用“精确放置协议”的类型。
- Auto: 在单人游戏中使用 v3，默认情况下在多人游戏中使用 Slabs-only，
  除非服务器有发送“carpet:hello”
 数据包的 Carpet mod，在这种情况下，该服务器上使用 v2。
- Version 3: 由 Tweakeroo 本身（单人游戏）或 Servux 支持。
- Version 2: 与带有 Carpet mod 的服务器兼容
  (either QuickCarpet by skyrising and DeadlyMC,
  or CarpetExtra in addition to FabricCarpet.
  And in both cases the 'accurateBlockPlacement' Carpet rule needs
  to be enabled on the server).
- Slabs only: Only fixes top slabs. Compatible with Paper servers.
- None: Does not modify coordinates.

If enabled, then the Flexible Block Placement and the
Accurate Block Placement use the protocol implemented in Carpet mod.
§6Note: This is required for any block rotations to work, other than
§6blocks that only care about the block side you click on (Hoppers, Logs etc.)
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.afterCl:
The number of right clicks to do per placed block when
tweakAfterClicker is enabled
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.angelBl: 当启用了"凭空放置时"，玩家可以凭空放置的距离，服务器允许的最大值是5。
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.blockRe:
The block reach distance to use if the override tweak is enabled.
The maximum the game allows is 64.
§6Do not attempt to use this at a value beyond
§6[0.5 - 1.0] higher than the Rules defined on a server.
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.blockTy:
Selects which type of warning message to show (if any)
when the Block Type Break Restriction feature prevents breaking a block
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.breakin:
The grid interval size for the grid breaking mode.
To quickly adjust the value, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.
The Breaking Restriction mode to use (hotkey-selectable)
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.chatBac:
The background color for the chat messages,
if 'tweakChatBackgroundColor' is enabled
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.chatTim:
The time format for chat messages, if tweakChatTimestamp is enabled
Uses the Java SimpleDateFormat format specifiers.
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.clientP:
Enable single player and client side placement rotations,
such as Accurate Placement working in single player without Carpet mod
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.customI:
The GUI scale value to use for inventory screens, if
§etweakCustomInventoryScreenScale§r is enabled.
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.debugLo:
Enables some debug log messages in the game console,
for debugging certain issues or crashes.
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.elytraC:
Whether or not to render the real pitch angle
indicator when the elytra camera mode is active
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.entityR:
The entity reach distance to use if the override tweak is enabled.
The maximum the game allows is 64.
§6Do not attempt to use this at a value beyond
§6[0.5 - 1.0] higher than the Rules defined on a server.
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.entityT:
Selects which type of warning message to show (if any)
when the Entity Type Attack Restriction feature prevents attacking an entity
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.fastBlo:
The maximum number of blocks to place per game tick
with the Fast Block Placement tweak
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.fastLef:
Allow the Fast Left Click to work in survival
also while holding tool items

The number of left clicks to do per game tick when
tweakFastLeftClick is enabled and the attack button is held down
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.fastPla:
If enabled, then the Fast Block Placement feature will always remember
the orientation of the first block you place.
Without this, the orientation will only be remembered
with the Flexible Block Placement enabled and active.
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.fastRig:
The number of right clicks to do per game tick when
tweakFastRightClick is enabled and the use button is held down
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.fillClo:
The new /fill and /clone block limit in single player,
if the tweak to override them is enabled
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.flexibl:
The color of the currently pointed-at
region in block placement the overlay
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.flyDece:
This adjusts how quickly the player will stop if the
'customFlyDeceleration' tweak is enabled
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.freeCam:
When enabled, the attacks and use actions
(ie. left and right clicks) in Free Camera mode are
let through to the actual player.

When enabled, the movement inputs in the Free Camera mode
will move the actual client player instead of the camera
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.gammaOv: The gamma value to use when the override option is enabled
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.handRes:
If enabled, then hand restocking happens
before the stack runs out

The stack size threshold at which Hand Restock will happen
in the pre-restock mode
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.hangabl:
If the hangableEntityTargetingBypass tweak is enabled,
then this controls whether the player must be or must not be
sneaking to be able to target the hangable entity (Item Frame or Painting).
 > true - Sneaking = ignore/bypass the entity
 > false - Sneaking = target the entity
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.hotbarS:
This is the last hotbar slot to use/cycle through
if the hotbar slot cycle tweak is enabled.
Basically the cycle will jump back to the first slot
when going over the maximum slot number set here.

This is the last hotbar slot to use if the hotbar slot randomizer
tweak is enabled. Basically the selected hotbar slot will be randomly
picked from 1 to this maximum slot after an item use.
The positioning of the hotbar swap overlay
The horizontal offset of the hotbar swap overlay
The vertical offset of the hotbar swap overlay
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.itemSwa:
This is the durability threshold (in uses left)
for the low-durability item swap feature.
Note that items with low total durability will go lower
and be swapped at 5%% left.
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.itemUse:
Bypass the new distance/coordinate check that was added in 1.18.2.

That check breaks the "accurate placement protocol" and causes
any blocks placed with a rotation (or other property) request to just become ghost blocks.

There is basically no need to ever disable this.
The check didn't even exist ever before 1.18.2.
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.mapPrev: Whether holding shift is required for the Map Preview
The size of the rendered map previews
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.periodi: The number of game ticks between automatic attacks (left clicks)
The number of game ticks between automatic uses (right clicks)
The number of game ticks to hold down attack
The number of game ticks between starting to hold down attack (left click)
The number of game ticks to hold down use
The number of game ticks between starting to hold down use (right click)
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.permane:
If true, then the permanent sneak tweak will
also work while GUIs are open
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.placeme:
The grid interval size for the grid placement mode.
To quickly adjust the value, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.

The number of blocks you are able to place at maximum per
right click, if tweakPlacementLimit is enabled.
To quickly adjust the value, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.
The Placement Restriction mode to use (hotkey-selectable)

When enabled, the Placement Restriction mode will toggle
its state of/off when you toggle the Fast Placement mode.
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.potionW: Only warn about potion effects running out that are marked as "beneficial"

The remaining duration of potion effects (in ticks)
after which the warning will start showing
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.remembe:
If enabled, then the Flexible Block Placement status
will be remembered from the first placed block,
as long as the use key (right click) is held down.
Basically you don't have to keep holding all the flexible
activation keys to fast place all the blocks in the same orientation.
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.renderL:
Maximum number of item entities rendered per frame.
Use -1 for normal behaviour, ie. to disable this limit.

Maximum number of XP orb entities rendered per frame.
Use -1 for normal behaviour, ie. to disable this limit.
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.sculkSe: The pulse length for Sculk Sensors, if the 'tweakSculkPulseLength' tweak is enabled.
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.shulker:
enables tinting/coloring the shulker box display
background texture with the dye color of the box
Whether or not holding shift is required for the Shulker Box preview
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.slotSyn:
This prevents the server from overriding the durability or
stack size on items that are being used quickly for example
with the fast right click tweak.

Enables the slot sync workaround at all times when the use key
is held, not only when using fast right click or fast block placement.
This is mainly for other mods that may quickly use items when
holding down use, such as Litematica's Easy Place mode.
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.snapAim: Whether or not to render the snap aim angle indicator
The color for the snap aim indicator background
Snap aim mode: yaw, or pitch, or both

If enabled, then the snap aim only snaps to the angle
when the internal angle is within a certain distance of it.
The threshold can be set in snapAimThreshold

Whether or not to allow overshooting the pitch angle
from the normal +/- 90 degrees up to +/- 180 degrees
The pitch angle step of the snap aim tweak

The angle threshold inside which the player rotation will
be snapped to the snap angle.

The angle threshold inside which the player rotation will
be snapped to the snap angle.
The yaw angle step of the snap aim tweak
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.structu: The maximum dimensions for a Structure Block's saved area
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.toolSwi:
The slots that the Tool Switch tweak is allowed to put tools to.
Note that Tool Switch can also switch to other slots in the hotbar,
if they already have the preferred tool, but it will only
swap new tools to these slots
The slots where the Tool Switch tweak does not work when they are active.
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.toolSwa:
Consider a Tools' Enchantments and Rarity
for Tool swapping, only after comparing if
it's the correct tool to use on the target.
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.weaponS:
Consider a Weapons' Enchantments and Rarity
for Weapon swapping, only after comparing if 
it's the correct Weapon to use on the target.
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.zoomAdj:
If enabled, then the mouse sensitivity is reduced
while the zoom feature is enabled and the zoom key is active
tweakeroo.config.generic.comment.zoomFov: The FOV value used for the zoom feature
tweakeroo.config.fixes.comment.elytraFix:
鞘翅着陆修复由 Earthcomputer 和 Nessie 提供。
鞘翅展开现在由原版修复，因此这只会影响鞘翅着陆。
tweakeroo.config.fixes.comment.macHorizo:
如果您使用的是 Mac，这将应用与 hscroll mod 相同的修复/更改，
同时不会破坏基于 malilib 的 mod 中的所有滚动处理。
tweakeroo.config.fixes.comment.ravagerCl: 修复了客户端在袭击后产生的幽灵方块等奇怪的东西
tweakeroo.config.lists.name.blockTypeBre: 方块破坏规则限制方式
tweakeroo.config.lists.name.entityTypeAt: 实体攻击规则限制方式
tweakeroo.config.lists.name.fastRightCli: 快速右键方块限制方式
快速右键物品限制方式
tweakeroo.config.lists.name.potionWarnin: 效果不足警报限制方式
tweakeroo.config.lists.name.repairModeSl: 经验修补模式的应用范围
tweakeroo.config.lists.comment.blockType: The restriction list type for the Block Type Break Restriction tweak

The blocks that are NOT allowed to be broken while the Block Break Restriction tweak is enabled,
if the blockBreakRestrictionListType is set to Black List

The only blocks that can be broken while the Block Break Restriction tweak is enabled,
if the blockBreakRestrictionListType is set to White List
tweakeroo.config.lists.comment.preferSil: 使用自动工具切换时，如果有可用的精准采集工具，优先使用精准采集工具
tweakeroo.config.lists.comment.creativeE:
开启后会在创造模式物品菜单中的[交通运输]中添加额外物品。
默认为命令方块与结构方块一类。
你也可以在§6[配置表单]-[额外物品清单]§f中自行额外添加。
tweakeroo.config.lists.comment.entityTyp: The restriction list type for the Entity Type Attack Restriction tweak

The entities that are NOT allowed to be attacked while the Entity Attack Restriction tweak is enabled,
if the entityAttackRestrictionListType is set to Black List

The only entities that can be attacked while the Entity Attack Restriction tweak is enabled,
if the entityAttackRestrictionListType is set to White List
tweakeroo.config.lists.comment.entityWea:
Mapping for what weapon should be used with the
'tweakWeaponSwitch' tweak.
'<default>' will be used when no other mapping is defined.
'<ignore>' will not trigger a weapon switch.
tweakeroo.config.lists.comment.fastPlace: The item restriction type for the Fast Block Placement tweak

The items that are NOT allowed to be used for the Fast Block Placement tweak,
if the fastPlacementItemListType is set to Black List

The items that are allowed to be used for the Fast Block Placement tweak,
if the fastPLacementItemListType is set to White List
tweakeroo.config.lists.comment.fastRight: The targeted block restriction type for the Fast Right Click tweak

The blocks that are NOT allowed to be right clicked on with
the Fast Right Click tweak, if the fastRightClickBlockListType is set to Black List

The blocks that are allowed to be right clicked on with
the Fast Right Click tweak, if the fastRightClickBlockListType is set to White List
The item restriction type for the Fast Right Click tweak

The items that are NOT allowed to be used for the Fast Right Click tweak,
if the fastRightClickListType is set to Black List

The items that are allowed to be used for the Fast Right Click tweak,
if the fastRightClickListType is set to White List
tweakeroo.config.lists.comment.flatWorld:
Custom flat world preset strings.
These are in the format: name;blocks_string;biome;generation_features;icon_item
The blocks string format is the vanilla format, such as: 62*minecraft:dirt,minecraft:grass
The biome can be the registry name, or the int ID
The icon item name format is minecraft:iron_nugget
tweakeroo.config.lists.comment.handResto: The restriction list type for the Hand Restock tweak

The items that are NOT allowed to be restocked with the Hand Restock tweak,
if the handRestockListType is set to Black List

The only allowed items that can be restocked with the Hand Restock tweak,
if the handRestockListType is set to White List
tweakeroo.config.lists.comment.potionWar: The list type for potion warning effects
The potion effects that will not be warned about
The only potion effects that will be warned about
tweakeroo.config.lists.comment.repairMod:
The slots the repair mode should use
Valid values: mainhand, offhand, head, chest, legs, feet
tweakeroo.config.lists.comment.unstackin:
The items that should be considered for the
'tweakItemUnstackingProtection' tweak
tweakeroo.config.disable.comment.disable: Disables all Armor Stand entity rendering
Disables stripping logs with an axe
Disables Bat spawning in single player
Disables Beacon beam rendering

Removes the block breaking particles.
(This is originally from usefulmod by nessie.)

Disables the block breaking cooldown,
for the time taken in between breaking
blocks
Disables the double-tap-forward-key sprinting
Disables boss bar rendering
Removes the fog that boss mobs cause

Disables chunk (re-)rendering. This will make any block changes non-visible
until this is disabled again and F3 + A is used to refresh the world rendering.
This might help with low fps in places with lots of block changes in some situations,
where the block changes are not really relevant at that time.

Disables ALL except player entity updates on the client.
This is mainly meant for situations where you need to be
able to do stuff to fix excessive entity count related problems
Disables all client-side light updates

Disables the game saving up to 20 chunks every tick
all the time, in addition to the normal auto-save cycle.
Removes infested stone blocks from the creative search inventory
Prevents rendering dead mobs (entities that are at 0 health)

Prevents targeting entities that are at 0 health.
This fixes for example hitting already dead mobs.

Disables ALL except player entity rendering.
This is mainly meant for situations where you need to be
able to do stuff to fix excessive entity count related problems
Prevent everything except player entities from getting ticked
If enabled, then falling block entities won't be rendered at all

Removes the potion effect particles/swirlies in first person
(from the player itself)
Removes the potion effect rendering from the inventory GUIs

If true, then there won't be any cooldown/equip animation
when switching the held item or using the item.
Removes the entity rendering from mob spawners
Disables the nausea visual effects
Removes the fog in the Nether
Disables the Nether Portal sound
Disable Observers from triggering at all
Disables the offhand item from getting rendered
Disables all particles
If enabled, then you can still open GUIs while in a Nether Portal
Disables rain rendering and sounds
Disables rendering of Scaffolding Blocks
Disables the fog that increases around the render distance
Removes the sidebar scoreboard rendering
Disables the vanilla text tooltip for Shulker Box contents
Disables converting grass etc. to Path Blocks with a shovel
Prevent the Sign edit GUI from opening

Disables the sky darkness below y = 63

(By moving the threshold y to 2 blocks below the bottom of the world instead)

Removes the slowdown from walking on Slime Blocks.
(This is originally from usefulmod by nessie.)

Disables the status effect HUD rendering (which is usually
in the top right corner of the screen)
Prevents all TileEntity renderers from rendering
Prevent all TileEntities from getting ticked

Prevents villager trades from ever locking, by always incrementing
the max uses as well when the recipe uses is incremented
Touching a wall doesn't drop you out from sprint mode

Disables the view bob wobble effect of the world, but not the hand
This setting will fail if you have Iris installed.
tweakeroo.config.internal.comment.flySpe:
This is just for the mod internally to track the
currently selected fly speed preset
tweakeroo.config.internal.comment.gammaV: The original gamma value, before the gamma override was enabled
tweakeroo.config.internal.comment.hotbar:
This is just for the mod internally to track the
"current hotbar row" for the hotbar scrolling feature
tweakeroo.config.internal.comment.slimeB: The original slipperiness value of Slime Blocks
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.name.breakingRes: 破坏范围限制 直线
破坏范围限制 对角线
破坏范围限制 面朝
破坏范围限制 水平面
破坏范围限制 棱边
破坏范围限制 平面
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.name.placementRe: 方块放置限制 直线
方块放置限制 对角线
方块放置限制 面朝
方块放置限制 水平面
方块放置限制 棱边
方块放置限制 平面
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.comment.accurate:
The key to activate the accurate block placement
mode/overlay for placing the block facing
into the clicked block face

The key to activate the accurate block placement
mode/overlay for placing the block facing
the opposite way from what it would be otherwise
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.comment.breaking: Switch the Breaking Restriction mode to the Column mode
Switch the Breaking Restriction mode to the Diagonal mode
Switch the Breaking Restriction mode to the Face mode
Switch the Breaking Restriction mode to the Layer mode
Switch the Breaking Restriction mode to the Line mode
Switch the Breaking Restriction mode to the Plane mode
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.comment.copySign:
Copies the text from an already-placed sign.
That text can be used with the tweakSignCopy tweak.
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.comment.elytraCa:
The key to lock the current real player rotations, only allowing the
inputs (mouse) to affect separate "camera rotations" used only for the rendering
while this key is active.
Meant for freely looking down/around while elytra flying straight.
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.comment.flexible:
The key to activate the flexible block placement
mode/overlay for placing the block in an adjacent position

The key to activate the flexible block placement
mode/overlay for placing the block in a
offset or diagonal position

The key to activate the flexible block placement
mode/overlay for placing the block with
a rotation/facing
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.comment.hotbarSc:
The key to hold to allow scrolling the hotbar
through the player inventory rows
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.comment.hotbarSw: The base key to show the hotbar/inventory overlay
Swap the hotbar with the top-most inventory row
Swap the hotbar with the middle inventory row
Swap the hotbar with the bottom-most inventory row
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.comment.inventor:
The key to activate the inventory preview feature
§6Deprecated in favor of the 1.21+ MiniHUD version
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.comment.openConf: The key open the in-game config GUI
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.comment.placemen: The key to mirror the targeted y-position within the block
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.comment.playerIn: The key to activate the player inventory peek/preview feature
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.comment.placemen: Switch the Placement Restriction mode to the Column mode
Switch the Placement Restriction mode to the Diagonal mode
Switch the Placement Restriction mode to the Face mode
Switch the Placement Restriction mode to the Layer mode
Switch the Placement Restriction mode to the Line mode
Switch the Placement Restriction mode to the Plane mode
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.comment.sitDownN: 让附近所有的宠物坐下
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.comment.standUpN:
让附近所有的宠物站起
全体起立！我向周围的猫猫狗狗宣布！\n从今天起这个地方叫lbw广场！
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.comment.swapElyt: 按下快捷键时，更换胸部装备为鞘翅/胸甲。
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.comment.toggleAc: Toggles the value of the Generic -> 'accuratePlacementProtocol' option
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.comment.toggleGr: 将鼠标从当前窗口切换到外部窗口，在外部窗口的鼠标操作不影响游戏内操作。
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.comment.toolPick: 按下快捷键后切换到适合采集当前方块的工具
tweakeroo.config.hotkey.comment.writeMap:
Writes all the currently available maps as images
to the 'config/tweakeroo/map_images/<worldname>/' directory
tweakeroo.config.feature_toggle.prettyNa: 更改结构方块范围上限
Enables a simpler version of Flexible placement, similar to
the Carpet mod, so basically either facing into or out
from the block face clicked on.

Enables a "after clicker" tweak, which does automatic right
clicks on the just-placed block.
Useful for example for Repeaters (setting the delay).
To quickly adjust the value, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.

Enables an aim lock, locking the yaw and pitch rotations
to the current values.
This is separate from the snap aim lock,
which locks them to the snapped value.
This allows locking them "freely" to the current value.

Enables an "Angel Block" tweak, which allows
placing blocks in mid-air in Creative mode.
Powered by "Flotato" technology.

Automatically switches to the Elytra when falling
and back to the previous chest equipment when landing.

Overrides the block reach distance with
the one set in Generic -> blockReachDistance

Restricts which blocks you are able to break (manually).
See the corresponding 'blockBreakRestriction*' configs in the Lists category.

When enabled, you can only break blocks in
a grid pattern, with a configurable interval.
To quickly adjust the interval, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.

Enables the Breaking Restriction mode
  (Plane, Layer, Face, Column, Line, Diagonal).
Basically only allows you to break blocks
in those patterns, while holding down the attack key.

Overrides the default chat background color
with the one from Generics -> 'chatBackgroundColor'

Stores the text from the chat input text field
and restores it when the chat is opened again
Adds timestamps to chat messages
在命令方块的GUI中添加额外的部分，用于设置命令方块的名称，并查看运行结果。

Adds custom items to item groups.
See Lists -> 'creativeExtraItems' to control which items are added to the groups.
Note: Currently these will be added to the Transportation group
(because it has the least items), but in the future
the groups will be configurable per added item

Allows adding custom flat world presets to the list.
The presets are defined in Lists -> flatWorldPresets

Allows changing the fly deceleration in creative or spectator mode.
This is mainly meant for faster deceleration ie. less "glide"
when releasing the movement keys.
See Generic -> flyDecelerationRampValue

Allows using a custom GUI scale for any inventory screen.
See Generic -> §ecustomInventoryGuiScale§r for the scale value

Allows locking the real player rotations while holding the 'elytraCamera' activation key.
The controls will then only affect the separate 'camera rotations' for the rendering/camera.
Meant for things like looking down/around while elytra flying nice and straight.

Overrides the entity reach distance with
the one set in Generic -> entityReachDistance

Restricts which entities you are able to attack (manually).
See the corresponding 'entityAttackRestriction*' configs in the Lists category.

Enables empty Shulker Boxes stacking up to 64.
NOTE: They will also stack inside inventories!
On servers this will cause desyncs/glitches
unless the server has a mod that does the same.
In single player this changes shulker box based system behaviour.

If enabled, then all explosion particles will use the
EXPLOSION_NORMAL particle instead of possibly
the EXPLOSION_LARGE or EXPLOSION_HUGE particles
Enables always rendering the F3 screen cursor

Enables "fake sneaking" ie. prevents you from falling from edges
without slowing down the movement speed

This tweak offsets the click position to the adjacent air block
from the block that you actually click on.
This basically allows you to place blocks against blocks
that have a click action, such as opening inventory GUIs,
without having to sneak. Note that this doesn't not actually
fake sneaking in any way, just the apparent effect is similar.

Enables fast/convenient block placement when moving
the cursor over new blocks

Enables automatic fast left clicking while holding down
the attack button (left click).
The number of clicks per tick is set in the Generic configs.

Enables automatic fast right clicking while holding down
the use button (right click).
The number of clicks per tick is set in the Generic configs.

Enables overriding the /fill and /clone command
block limits in single player.
The new limit can be set in the Generic configs,
in the 'fillCloneLimit' config value

Enables overriding the fly speed in creative or spectator mode
and using some presets for it

Enables placing blocks in different orientations
or with an offset, while holding down the
hotkeys for those modes.

Enables a free camera mode, similar to spectator mode,
but where the player will remain in place where
you first activate the free camera mode

Overrides the video settings gamma value with
the one set in the Generic configs

Enables swapping a new stack to the main or the offhand
when the previous stack runs out

Allows not targeting hangable entities (Item Frames and Paintings).
The Generic -> hangableEntityBypassInverse option can be used to control
whether you must be sneaking or not sneaking to be able to target the entity.
Emulates holding down the attack button
Emulates holding down the use button
Enables the hotbar swapping via scrolling feature

Enables cycling the selected hotbar slot after each placed
block, up to the set max slot number.
To quickly adjust the value, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.

Enables randomizing the selected hotbar slot after each placed
block, up to the set max slot number.
To quickly adjust the value, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.
Enables the hotbar swapping via hotkeys feature

Enables an inventory preview while having the cursor over
a block or an entity with an inventory and holding down
the configured hotkey.
§6Deprecated in favor of the 1.21+ MiniHUD version

If enabled, then items configured in Lists -> unstackingItems
won't be allowed to spill out when using.
This is meant for example to prevent throwing buckets
into lava when filling them.

If enabled, then the level of Respiration and Aqua Affinity enchantments,
and having the Fire Resistance effect active,
will greatly increase the visibility under lava.

If enabled, then holding shift over maps in an inventory
will render a preview of the map

If enabled, then opposite movement keys won't cancel each other,
but instead the last pressed key is the active input.

Enables periodic attacks (left clicks)
Configure the interval in Generic -> periodicAttackInterval

Enables periodic uses (right clicks)
Configure the interval in Generic -> periodicUseInterval

Enables periodically holding attack for a configurable amount of time.
Configure the interval in Generic -> periodicHoldAttackInterval
and the duration in periodicHoldAttackDuration
§6Note: You should not use the normal hold attack
§6or the periodic attack at the same time

Enables periodically holding use for a configurable amount of time.
Configure the interval in Generic -> periodicHoldUseInterval
and the duration in periodicHoldUseDuration
§6Note: You should not use the normal hold use
§6or the periodic use at the same time
If enabled, the player will be sneaking the entire time
If enabled, the player will be always sprinting when moving forward

When enabled, you can only place blocks in
a grid pattern, with a configurable interval.
To quickly adjust the value, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.

When enabled, you can only place a set number
of blocks per use/right click.
To quickly adjust the value, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.

Enables the Placement Restriction mode
  (Plane, Layer, Face, Column, Line, Diagonal)

Restricts block placement so that you can only
place blocks against the same block type
you first clicked on

Restricts block placement so that you can only
place blocks against the same block type
you are holding in your hand

Enables a player inventory peek/preview, while holding the
configured hotkey key for it.

Prints a warning message to the hotbar when
non-ambient potion effects are about to run out

Enables printing the player's coordinates to chat on death.
This feature is originally from usefulmod by nessie.

If enabled, then before each block placement, the same block
is switched to hand that you are placing against

If enabled, then the player list is always rendered without
having to hold down the key (tab by default)

Allows the edge-most client-loaded chunks to render.
Vanilla doesn't allow rendering chunks that don't have
all the adjacent chunks loaded, meaning that the edge-most chunk
of the client's loaded won't render in vanilla.
§lThis is also very helpful in the Free Camera mode!§r

When enabled, invisible entities are rendered like
they would be in spectator mode.

Enables limiting the number of certain types of entities
to render per frame. Currently XP Orbs and Item entities
are supported, see Generic configs for the limits.

If enabled, then fully repaired items held in hand will
be swapped to damaged items that have Mending on them.
Allows modifying the Sculk Sensor pulse length. Set the pulse length in Generic -> sculkSensorPulseLength

Use Server Data Syncer for entities such as Shulker Boxes,
which allows inventoryPreview to work on servers.
§6You must be an operator of the server or install server-side
§6mods to make the syncer work even this option is set to true.

Enables the Shulker Box contents display when hovering
over them in an inventory and holding shift

When enabled, placed signs will use the text from
the previously placed sign.
Can be combined with tweakNoSignGui to quickly place copies
of a sign, by enabling that tweak after making the first sign.
Enabled a snap aim tweak, to make the player face to pre-set exact yaw rotations

Enables a snap aim lock, locking the yaw and/or pitch rotations
to the currently snapped value
Restores the 1.15.2 sneaking behavior

Allows spectators to teleport to other spectators.
This is originally from usefulmod by nessie.

Allows overriding the structure block limit.
The new limit is set in Generic -> structureBlockMaxSize

If enabled, then any damageable items held in the hand that
are about to break will be swapped to fresh ones

If enabled, then tab-completing coordinates while not
looking at a block, will use the player's position
instead of adding the ~ character.
Enables automatically switching to an effective tool for the targeted block
Enables automatically switching to a weapon for the targeted entity

Mirrors the targeted y-position within the block bounds.
This is basically for placing slabs or stairs
in the opposite top/bottom state from normal,
if you have to place them against another slab for example.
Enables using the zoom hotkey to, well, zoom in
是否允许每个Tick内进行多次触发

§6Note: This feature works either at all or§r
§6at least fully only in single player§r
